src:
The New Pope: Jude Law a John Malkovich v novém teaseru
Jude Law a John Malkovich jsou hlavními protagonisty seriálu The New Pope. Podívejte se na nový teaser.
04 Nov 2019, 18:43 by Václav Limberk



Jude Law ve filmu The New Pope



Jude Law a John Malkovich ve filmu The New Pope


Všechny díly seriálu The New Pope režíroval znovu Paolo Sorrentino. V hlavních rolích hrají Jude Law a John Malkovich. Kromě nich se v seriálu objeví i Sharon Stone nebo Marilyn Manson. Premiéra na HBO bude v lednu 2020.Teaser zhlédněte níže.


Teaser TV série The New Pope
text:
The New Pope: Jude Law and John Malkovich in a new teaser
Jude Law and John Malkovich are the main protagonists of The New Pope. Check out the new teaser.
04 Nov 2019, 18:43 by Vaclav Limberk



Jude Law in The New Pope



Jude Law and John Malkovich in The New Pope


All the episodes of The New Pope were again directed by Paolo Sorrentino. Starring Jude Law and John Malkovich. In addition, Sharon Stone and Marilyn Manson appear in the series. The premiere of HBO will be in January 2020.Teaser see below.


Teaser TV series The New Pope
